THANK YOU TO ALL OUR SPONSORS!

This event would not be made possible without the help and support of all of our great sponsors and staff!

We would like to give a HUGE thank you to Office Outfitters for providing funds needed to rent the skatepark.
Without them, we would not have been able to bring this event forward to the point we have come today.

We also want to give a very special thank you to Silver Threads Embroidery, as they have provided all of the Event Staff T-Shirts you will see throughout the event!
